channel.title: Michael Mahoney on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content in Michael Mahoney on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: Community structure in large social and information networks, Michael Mahoney, Stanford, speaking at the University of Michigan on Friday, December 5, 2008, 11am-noon, CSE 3941
item.description: thanks to Lada Adamic for the heads up for this seminar on the U of Michigan campus. more about the speaker: an old home page at Yale; he's ex Yahoo research; his current home page at Stanford.  He has published a paper at arXiv that covers this material.  A pull quote from that paper is: Our results suggest a significantly more refined picture of community structure in large networks than has been appreciated previously.
